job_tasks.phrase: custom train models to our customer's needs
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions training custom models, which is a core aspect of the 'Modeling' task category, particularly in the context of GenAI.
This phrase directly refers to modifying or creating models using Large Language Models (LLMs), fitting squarely within the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: custom modelling on image generation models
job_tasks.justification: Similar to LLM custom modeling, this phrase indicates work on image generation models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.
This phrase reinforces the idea of tailoring and training models for specific customer requirements, aligning with the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers
job_tasks.justification: This task involves capturing and replicating a specific characteristic (tone of voice) within a model, which is a form of model customization and thus falls under 'Modeling'.

job_tasks.phrase: figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks
job_tasks.justification: While prompt engineering can be seen as a skill for modeling, the act of 'figuring out methods' and applying them to 'accomplish tasks' through an AI system implies building functional interactions, which touches upon application development and thus 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering
job_tasks.justification: The creation of 'tutorials and interactive tools' is a clear indicator of software development, aimed at creating user-facing educational content.

job_tasks.phrase: experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase involves hands-on work with specific AI models (ChatGPT, GPT3.5) and their customization, directly mapping to the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts
job_tasks.justification: Achieving specific 'complex behaviours' from AI models through carefully designed prompts is a key aspect of generative model interaction and fine-tuning, thus belonging to 'Modeling'.

soft_skills.phrase: learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world!
figure out the best methods of prompting our AI
get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with and customizing Large Language Models (LLMs) and image generation models, including custom training and achieving complex behaviors through prompting. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly the focus on generative techniques and building around LLMs.
